name: dtbegone
author: BasedUser AKA router
description:
Removes all framerate dependency and locks game actions to 1 tick per frame.
[#f]BREAKS sk7725/TimeControl[]

Effects and usecases:
- With good GPUs and vsync off, allows precisely computed timewarping.
- With good gpus and vsync ON, allows you to test designs at their baseline 60fps speed.
- Desyncs almost everything in multiplayer (but we're already desynced so it doesn't matter)
